body:
Comment 2: 
after compare with /opt/go/doc/codelab/wiki/final.go, I understood that should change
from 'page','title','body' to 'Page','Title','Body'.

Could you put the home work answer?
I've written one.  But, I'm afraid it is wrong.(see attachment file)
My wiki has a bug.  If the wiki text is "MyWiki abHisWiki xxx". then MyWiki and HisWiki
will be highlight.  I don't know how to write a correct regular expression about wiki
word.  Or, that's because 'go' still haven't powerful regular expression?
Attachments: 1. wiki.go (3211 bytes)
